description:
Part A: On his way back from a business trip, Kihara stops by a hot springs town and runs into Moguro. After that, they have some fun with some geishas. Kihara has too much to drink and passes out. Moguro then creates an opportunity for him to have the night of his dreams...
Part B: Deyashiro ends up quitting his job and starts going to the Fantasy Company through a referral by Moguro. The purpose of that company was to retrain people in order to be able to enter the work force again...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Folies aux sources chaudes – Un emploi de rêve
温泉奇行 / マボロシガイシャ
